title: Red vs Green - Watch Face
summary: A simple Watch Face for Android Wear devices
description: A simple Watch Face for Android Wear devicesFeatures:* Growing bubbles design* Clear and Crystal colors* Battery Indicator bubble - We know how important is that little thing* Low Energy ModeScreenshot based on templates created by Daniele Bonaldo (danielebonaldo.com) and Cyril Mottier (cyrilmottier.com)Licensed under Creative Common License 3.0
descriptionHTML:
A simple Watch Face for Android Wear devices

Features:

* Growing bubbles design
* Clear and Crystal colors
* Battery Indicator bubble - We know how important is that little thing
* Low Energy Mode

Screenshot based on templates created by Daniele Bonaldo (danielebonaldo.com) and Cyril Mottier (cyrilmottier.com)

Licensed under Creative Common License 3.0
recentChanges: Fixed the missing refresh bug that occurs when the watch is set in no keep up screen mode
